titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 791) to authorize the water resources research activities of the United States Geological Survey, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-464.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/1/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 791 (water resources research).
